description: The film and stage actor Willem Dafoe and the avant-garde director Robert Wilson talk with the culture writer and author John Rockwell.
title: TimesTalks Luminato Festival Video: Willem Dafoe and Robert Wilson
title_page: TimesTalks Luminato Festival Video: Willem Dafoe and Robert Wilson - The New York Times
text: The film and stage actor Willem Dafoe and the avant-garde director Robert Wilson, whose staging of “The Life and Death of Marina Abramović” will have its North American premiere at the Luminato Festival, talk with the New York Times contributing culture writer and author John Rockwell.
